name: Organizations
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for creating new organization created

Request payload must contain the following fields:

organization_name: STRING
organiazation_code: STRING
details: STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/organizations

raw 
  {
    "organization_name": "rk college",
    "organization_code": "rk223",
    "details": "rk college intermedite junior"
}

Response:

201 - Created 

  {"status":201,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"created_at":"2022-09-15T03:07:40.676Z","updated_at":"2022-09-15T03:07:40.676Z","status":"ACTIVE","organization_id":76,"organization_name":"rk college","organization_code":"rk223","created_by":40,"updated_by":40}]}
